attributes.action: Ban smoking and drinking within the parliament buildings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As with the no smoking legislation coming into effect on the 1st July 2007, the government in its wisdom and hypocrisy has failed to include itself in this legislation of a no smoking policy in confinded spaces  and therefore is acting over and above the law that they pertain to enforce.
I also believe that anyone who drinks alcohol and then sits in parliament debating the peoples future and laws that govern this country be stopped with immediate effect.
We request and petition the government to close the bars in parliament and to have the same no smoking policy that they have imposed on everyone else in England and the United Kingdom.
Democracy and fairness!
